short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Building a wall around your best words.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This takes all your Trumps out, and replaces them with a much friendlier gorilla.

Because as anyone with an Ivy League education knows, "Trump" isn't one of the Best Words.
